property.name: accessTo
property.formula: (select distinct n.accessTo from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: trunkTo
property.formula: (select distinct n.trunkTo from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: accessVlan
property.formula: (select distinct n.accessVlan from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: trunkVlan
property.formula: (select distinct n.trunkVlan from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: accessSeq
property.formula: (select distinct n.accessSeq from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: accessMac
property.formula: (select distinct n.accessMac from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: accessName
property.formula: (select distinct n.accessName from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: trunkSeq
property.formula: (select distinct n.trunkSeq from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: trunkMac
property.formula: (select distinct n.trunkMac from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: trunkName
property.formula: (select distinct n.trunkName from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: accessMasterId
property.formula: (select distinct n.accessMasterId from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: trunkMasterId
property.formula: (select distinct n.trunkMasterId from cmdb_asm_netport_link_view n where n.nid = id and (seq=n.accessseq or seq=n.trunkseq))

property.name: assetName
property.formula: (select master.assetName from cmdb_asm_master master where master.id = masterId)

property.name: serial
property.formula: (select master.serial from cmdb_asm_master master where master.id = masterId)
